runs.comm: length delivery cutting away from the stumps, left  alone for Kamran to gather
shuffles towards off stump, Tanvir hurls in a full delivery on the middle but by that shuffle he got outside the line and whipped it through midwicket.
And he charges out this time, Tanvir bangs it in short, slashed off the outer edge to left of third man
movement in the air and off the track, left alone
lands around the off stump on a length and slants away, shoulders arms
on the middle, full, curving in, gets behind the line to push it to mid-on
Thwack! It was a length delivery on the off and middle, the tall Reekers stood up straight and thrashed it on the up and over the non-striker's head
Biff. Slightly short in length, he opened up his stance and flat-batted it high over mid-on
But he is gone now. He cleared his front foot and went for the pull but top edged it to square leg He was looking dangerous but is gone, going for the third four in a row.
short in length, moving towards middle stump, defended to the on side of the pitch
kicking up from back of length, just outside off stump, pushed to the off side
gets behind the line to defend the back-of-length delivery to point
short and outside off, goes for the big flashing cut but the ball bounces over the blade and rushes through to Akmal
gets forward to tap the length delivery close on the off side and rushes across for a quick single
moves outside leg but can't put bat to the ball and Akmal moves to his left to collect it

just over backward point. It was the slower one, sliced off the outer edge, Malik runs back but doesn't judge it well at all.. He was nowhere near the ball in the end as he dived . He should have caught that.
stays back to work it to square leg
leans over to slice a full length delivery over point region for couple of runs. They are taking some risks to get in some big hits
high bouncer outside off stump, left alone
top edged over slips. It was another short-pitched delivery, beaten for pace as he went for the pull but gets a nice fat edge
charges out and gets a short-pitched delivery at this body, tries the pull but edges it to the off side
moving away outside off stump, beaten on the flash

dropped by Butt. His fielding has been terrible through this tourney. It was the sharp bouncer and the top-edged pull came his way at fine-leg but he got into terrible position and in the end dropped. Andrew Miller says, "Butt again! Younis said at The Oval they might have been forced to drop him because of his fielding ..."
worked past square leg for a single
fullish on the legs, turned straight to short fine-leg where Butt doesn't field cleanly
from round the stumps this time, from wide of the crease, stabbed off the outer edge to third man
yorker length on the middle and off, dug out to the off sdie of the pitch
on the middle stump line, pushed towards mid-on and he rushes across immediately after playing the  shot
still from round the stumps, full toss, dipping in outside off, driven to cover
length delivery outside off stump, forced away but straight to backward point
short in length outside off, stays adjacent to the line to steer it deftly past backward point
fuller, just outside off stump, pushed to cover for a single
pretty full and straight but unlucky Gul. It ran off the inner edge and went past Tanvir at short fine-leg. Tanvir is not 100% fit.
back to short of length and outside off, tries the cut but can't connect.
fullish, on the middle stump, worked through midwicket for a single
on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
flighted outside off, driven to covers
quicker, shorter and he goes for the cut. It slices off the outer edge and flew over short third man.
flatter, on the off and middle, tapped t o the on side
quicker and flat, on the middle and off, full, driven to long-on
slows up the pace and it goes on straight with the arm, past the outside edge. Akmal whips the bails off and shouts out an appeal. The back foot did slide out but he managed to drag it back in time
Afridi does the trick. What a fine yorker to get rid of the batsman. Zuiderent tried to bring his bat down in a hurry. Blur. The off stump has been uprooted.
turned past square leg for a single
skids on towards the off stump, jabbed to the off side
another one coming in, slower this time, beats the prod and rolls off the pad
a tad quicker, full on the middle, turned to short fine-leg
loopy bouncing topspinner, lunges out to defend and the ball bounces to strike him high
comes down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the ball but goes through with the lofted shot and it falls short of long-on
goes for the slog sweep, gets the top edge but falls safely in  the backward square leg region
moves down the track and drives through the off side

Butt takes the catch and Kamran Akmal rushes to him in glee. Another edge from the slog sweep and Butt settled under it at short fine-leg to take the simple catch. But when you have been dropping left right centre, nothing is easy I guess. It was a nice little doosra
turned past square leg

Another fine doosra from Ajmal. Kervezee had dashed down the track, looking for the big hit to the on side, but was left stranded by the one that broke away. Akmal does the rest. Top bowling and Pakistan are running hot here.
turns down the leg side and Akmal collects
just outside off, cut to backward point
breaks back in towards off stump, chopped to short third man
run out missed bouncing top spinner over the off stump, cut down to short third man. Run out missed by Afridi. The throw came in to him but he didn't collect the throw and spilled it.
wrong un skidding in, didn't read it well, picked it off the pitch but manages to stab it to point
skidding in, jabbed away to point, lots of confusion about the single and he retreats back in time
skids on quickly towards off stump, nudged to the off side
turning in towards off stump, goes back, waits, opens the bat-face and plays a deft late cut well clear of the short third man fielder
short in length, turning in, cut to deep point where Gul stops
moves outside leg, Malik slows up the pace and follows the batsman, tapped to square leg
flighted full, driven to sweeper cover
slow in the air, turning in towards middle and off, tapped close on the leg side for a single
comes down the track,. Malik shortens the length, pushed out to midwicket
Afridi has cleaned him up. Pakistan climb all over the Dutch. Grooth moved outside leg, Afridi skids it on towards the leg stump and Grooth misses it completely
flighted across, edged to short fine-leg region.

And they continue to crumble under the spin. Shahid Afridi is turning in a little gem of a spell here. Afridi saw van Bunge charge out and slipped in a yorker outside the off stump. van Bunge missed it but Akmal doesn't. Stumped!
turns it down the leg side
nice loopy delivery on the stumps, another dot ball
just outside off, skids on to Akmal
they are struggling here. Another unconvincing stab to the on side
has enough of trying to pick the spin, moves outside leg stump and unfurls a slog sweep. Meaty blow.
turns in, dabbed to point region
spins down the leg side
turns in slowly, dabbed to short fine-leg
And then they were three. Malik does a AFridi this time. He sees the batsman rush down the track, slips in a yorker outside off and Akmal does well to collect and break the stumps.
pushes this down the leg side.... another fine take from Akmal
slower in the air, turning in from outside off, jabbed to the on side
leg break on the off stump line, defended to the on side of the pitch
googly, tuns in with bounce, attempts the sweep and edges it to short fine-leg where Tanvir is stationed
Afridi is having a great time with the ball and Pakistan maintain their charge through to the next round. Afridi  flighted it wide outside off and it was hit straight to long-off
goes right back to defend it back down the pitch
fiery yorker outside off stump, past Nannes' desperate attempt to dig it out and it crashes into the forearm of Akmal and he is in pain
skids outside off, dabbed to point
loud shout for lbw as he doesn't connect with the sweep shot
lunges forward to get a leading edge over extra cover

Almost run out! It was hit to cover where the captain Younis swooped on the ball and fired in a throw to Akmal who whipped the bails off. Stranded short of the crease you would think but the bails didn't come off in time.
goes right back to work it to square leg
charges down the track but is beaten by the lack of pace and is hit on the pad
yorker on the off stump line, pushed out to mid-off
bouncer outside off stump and Akmal gathers. Afridi rushes to have a word with Gul
moves all over the crease and Gul fires in another bouncer ... Akmal gathers.
fuller, outside off stump, tries to slash it away, gets a inner edge and the ball rolls to Akmal
makes room by going outside leg and drives to right of deep cover
slower one, bounces past the attempted carve to the off side and goes over the middle stump
Gull misses a run out! It was pushed to the off side of the pitch and the non-striker had rushed out. Gul turned around and fired in a throw but missed the stumps and now they take the single
Ajmal turns it in from outside off, beats the swipe and hits the pad
fetches it from outside off and sweeps it to deep backward square leg
flighted on the middle, swept to long leg

Another stumping from Akmal. It was another lovely little doosra from Ajmal, who has really impressed today. Nannes had walked into the shot and was beaten by the delivery that broke away. He must have thought that he was bowled as he didn't initially try to get back. Akmal had not collected cleanly but recovered quickly to break the stumps. nannes turned back only after that. Too late.
gets behind the line of the off break to defend it to the on side
flighted full, driven to long-off
really full and outside leg, Smits moves further outside leg, has a swing and a miss.
yorker length at the leg stump, dug out towards cover, Afridi fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end. The batsman seems to have been just in.

And Pakistan go through to the next round in style. What a Dutch capitulation this has been. Gul cleans up the leg stump. The crowd roar. Netherlands played well against England but couldn't repeat the trick today. Pakistan didn't allow them. Their spinners, Ajmal and Afridi in particular, were fantastic. As some of you have mailed in, Kamran Akmal now has the most stumpings in a T20.
